```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(gridlayout)

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

switch(
  params$mode,
  base = use_gridlayout_rmd(),
  only_grid_panel = use_gridlayout_rmd(is_card_styled = "grid_panel"),
  stop("That's not an optional mode!")
)

```

## Main

```{gridlayout}
|      |        |         |
|------|--------|---------|
|2rem  |200px   |1fr      |
|150px |header  |header   |
|1fr   |sidebar |main     |
|120px |footer  |footer   |
```
